info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 44501
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;zenika.com.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 44501
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 6, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;zenika.com.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
zenika.com.	300	IN	MX	1 aspmx.l.google.com.
zenika.com.	300	IN	MX	5 alt1.aspmx.l.google.com.
zenika.com.	300	IN	MX	5 alt2.aspmx.l.google.com.
zenika.com.	300	IN	MX	10 alt3.aspmx.l.google.com.
zenika.com.	300	IN	MX	10 alt4.aspmx.l.google.com.
zenika.com.	300	IN	MX	32767 ms17411114.msv1.invalid.
